weather_report:
As twilight settles over Boston, a blanket of fog swathes the city, creating an ethereal ambiance that imbues the evening with quietude. The air carries a gentle warmth, hovering around sixty-four degrees, accompanied by the soft whispers of a northeast breeze. The muted light casts an enigmatic glow, rendering familiar sights nearly unrecognizable and inviting contemplative strolls in the soft obscurity. 

Looking ahead to tomorrow, expect the fog to linger until morning, yielding to the gentle embrace of mostly cloudy skies by afternoon. The temperature will flirt with eighty-one degrees, promising a delightful balance of warmth, tempered by a light breeze. A casual ensemble made up of breathable fabrics would suit the day well, allowing for comfort whether you find yourself amidst the cloistered corners of a local café or meandering through the parks. Consider spending some time exploring the lesser-trodden paths of the Emerald Necklace, where the quiet tranquility of the vaulting trees invites leisurely reflection as nature awakens in a vivid yet subtle display of summertime hues.
